channel.title: data mining on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in data mining on Orange

item.title: Visualizations 101
item.description: Orange has a wide array of visualizations, which enable exploring the data from different perspectives. But each visualization is unique - it is used for a specific purpose, which is closely related to how one interprets the plot. Let’s have a look at the most common visualizations in Orange, when to use them and how to read them. We will use the heart_disease.tab data set from the File widget in the next examples.
